name: Banette
description: Resentment at being cast off made it spring into being. Some say that treating it well will satisfy it, and it will once more become a stuffed toy.

attacks.name: Resolute Spite
attacks.effect: Put up to 7 damage counters on this Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage for each damage counter you placed in this way.

attacks.name: Eerie Light
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Confused.
